item.title: Reproducible (Data) Science with Docker and R
item.description: In my data team at work, we’ve been using Docker for a while now. At least, the engineers in our team have been using it, we data scientists have been very reluctant to pick it up so far. Why bother with a new tool (that seems complicated) when you don’t see the reason, right? Until I was about to hold my Houseprice Talk again and wanted to make some small changes to my xaringan slides and nothing worked.
